Th yim lukh pnnụ̄ mal Allah tʿālyā snz rẓa ḥạṣl krnh khạṭr th panun pan (aymans th aṭaʿts pytth) mẓbvṭ krnh khạṭr khrch chih kran, tihnz mthal chhe tithhi akhi baghch hish yus thzrs āshi, tath pytth spdi zvrdar bạrsh, pth krri suh dognh myvh,th hrgah tath zvrdarbạrish ḥạṣl thi gczihh nh, tylhi āshi (tath) shbnm (nath lothi vayhi rvud lav) thi sytthah, th Allah tʿālyā chuh tuhndyn aʿmaln var pạtthụ̄ vuchhn vvl.

Kya tohyhi mnz krēa kanhh shkhṣ yhi psnd zi ts āshi khzrn th dchhn hund aakh bagh yath bnụ̄ kinụ̄ kolh āsn pkan,ts khạṭr āsn tth mnz (khzrv th dachhv ʿlavh thi) pth qsmkụ̄ myvh th (aath vqts mnz) vathi amis bujr th (vunhi) āsn amụ̄ sndụ̄ avlad thi kmzvr th (aath vqts mnz) yiyhi aakh czahtth yath mnz (ṣrf) nar āshi th suh bagh dazi (tylhi kya āshi tmụ̄ snzi mḥrvmy th pryshạny hund ḥal) yithe pạtthụ̄ chuh Allah tʿālyā tuhndi mokhh ttakarh pạtthụ̄ nshạniyhi byan frmavan takh tohụ̄ kriv ghvr (kya tylhi chihva tohụ̄ yczhan zi ạkhrts mnz gczh tuhnzn ʿmln hund bagh thi ryakạry hndis nars mnz dzith pyon th tohyhi āsyv nh ddkhis rvzn vvl thi kanhh).

Ae ayman valyv! Timav pak kmayav mnz th tamhi mnz yhi aashi tuhndi khạṭr zmyn mnz koddmut chuh ạsiv (Allah tʿālyā snzi vathi mnz) khrch kran th tamhi mnz mah kriv mokur mal (Allah tʿālyā snzi vathi mnz) khrch krnuk aradh tkyaz (hrgah tohy suh dinh yiyhi tylhi) rttiv nh to hụ̄ panh hrgz suh aamhi varae zi tohụ̄ vttiv tath mnz achh,th zạniv zi be shk chuh Allah tʿālyā be nyaz pth ḥmds layq.

Shyṭan chuhv tohyhi (Allah tʿālyā snzi vathi mnzkhrch krnh nishhi pth rttnh mokhh) aathh chhoniruk bym pavan th be ḥyạyy hund chuhv ḥkm divan, th Allah tʿālyā chuhv tohyhi pnnhi mghfrtuk th fẓluk vʿdh frmavan, th Allah tʿālyā chuh sytthah vusʿt vvl var pạtthụ̄ zann vvl.
Ys yczhan chuh ts chuh gatth jar ʿṭa kran th ys (ḥkmt th) gatth jar ʿṭa krnh āv ts gov sytthah bodd rczr ḥạṣl,th ṣrf chih timae lukh nṣyḥt ḥạṣl kran yimn ʿql th danạyy āsan chhe.
Th tohụ̄ yikynczhah thi khrch krivu ya yosh thi nadhrthạviv, tylhi chuh Allah tʿālyā tath pzụ̄pạtthụ̄ zanan,th ẓạlimn khạṭr chuhnh kanhh mdd krn vvl.

Agr tohụ̄ khyrat diyiv nnụ̄ pạtthụ̄ tylhi chuh yithi jan (aamhi sintụ̄ mylhi baqyn trghyb) th agr tohụ̄ yim czvuripạtthụ̄ (pth) mḥtajn tam vatnạvivtylhi chuh tuhndi khạṭr (zyadh) bhtr, th Allah tʿālyā kri (aamhi khyrat kh vjh kinụ̄) tuhndụ̄ kynhh gnah tohyhi nshh dvur, th Allah tʿālyā chuh tuhndyo aʿmalv nishhi bakhbr.

Yuhund hdayt pravan vạlụ̄banun chuhnh tuhndi dhmh blkh ys Allah tʿālyā he yczhan chuh ts chuh hdayt divan, th tvhụ̄ yus thi mal khrch kriv tath mnzchuhv tohyhi panse fạyidh th Allah tʿālyā snzrẓa mndy czharnh vrạe chuhnh tuhund khrch krun hrgz mnạsb,th tvhụ̄ yus thi mal khrch kriv (tamiyuk ajr) yiyav tohyhi pvur pvur dinh th tohyhi pytth yiyhi nh kanhh ẓlm krnh.

(khyrat) chuh timn fqyrn hund ḥq yim Allah tʿālyā snzi vathi mnz (kmavnh nishhi) rukavnh chih āmtụ̄, tim chihnh hykan (dyn kyn amvurn mnz lgatar āvrụ̄ rvznh kinụ̄) zmyns mnz phyirith thvurith,tihindi (prhyzgạry kinụ̄) ṭmʿ nishhi path rvznh mvjvb chuh nadan (yus tihindi ḥalh nishhi be khbr chuh) timn maldar smjhan,tohụ̄ prz nạviyvukh tim tihinzi shklhi kinụ̄,tim chihnh lukn hrgz aathh daran zi khbr zarparma pyyhi krun (mkhlv qs brvnhh knhi), th tohụ̄ yus mal thi khrch kriv tth chuh kunhi shk vrạe Allah tʿālyā var pạtthụ̄ zanan.

Yim lukh (Allah tʿālyā snzi vathi mnz) rats dohs pnnụ̄ mal czhayhi pạtthụ̄ th nnụ̄ pạtthụ̄ khrch chih kran tylhi chuh tihindi khạṭr tihindis rbs nishhi tihundajr th (qyamt kh doh) nah āshi timn kanhh khvf th nah āsn tim ghmgyn.

Yim lukh svud chih khyvan tim hykn nh (qyamt kh doh) thvd vthith mgr tithh pạtthụ̄ (vothn) yithh pạtthụ̄ suh shkhṣ thod chuh vothan yus shyṭann (jinn) aathh lạgith bvvlh āshi kormut,yhi chuh aamhi mvjvub zi tim chih vnan zi tjart (hyon knun) thi he svudkụ̄ pạtthụ̄ chuh,ḥalankh Allah tʿālyā hn chuh tjart (svdagry) ḥlal kormut th svud chuhn ḥram kormut,ā, yymis nishhi tmụ̄ sndis rb sndi ṭrfh nṣyḥt vạcz, pth phyvur suh (svud nishhi) baz,vonụ̄ yikynczhah aamhi brvnhh spudmut chuh thi chuh amụ̄ sundue, th amụ̄ sund mʿāmlh chuh Allah tʿālyā has ḥvalh, vonụ̄ yymụ̄ aamhi pth thi rott tylhi chih yithụ̄ lukh jhnmy, tim rvzn tath mnz hmyshh.

Th Allah tʿālyā chuh svuds mittavan (yʿny svudy mals chuh brkt kran khtm) th ṣdqatn chuh huryr kran (yʿny ṣdqh sintụ̄ chuh mals zyadh brkt kran) th Allah tʿālyā chuhnh kạnshi na shukr s nafrmans psnd kran.

Be shk yimav lukv ayman aon th pth kri timavnyk ʿmlh,byyhi thạvkh nmaz qạyim th zkvāh rvudụ̄ divan,tihindi khạṭr chuh tihindis rbs nishhi tihund ajr,th timn pytth āshi nh (ạkhrts mnz) kanhh khvf th nah āsn tim ghmgyn.
Ae ayman valyv! Allah tʿālyā hs khocziv th yikynczhah thi svud mnz pth kun rvudmut chuh, (suh) trạviv agr tohụ̄ (pazidl san) ayman thavan chihv.

Vonụ̄ agr tohyhi yhi koruv nh tylhi gczihv Allah tʿālyā th tmụ̄ sndis rsvl (ṣly Allah ʿlyh vslm) sndi ṭrfh aʿlani jngs pytth khbrdar th agr tohụ̄ tvbh kriv tylhi chih tuhndi khạṭr tuhndụ̄ aṣl mal (jạyiz,aath ṣvrts mnz) nah kriv tohụ̄ panh ẓlm th nah yiyhi tohyhi pytth ẓlm krnh.

Th hrgah qrẓ dar tng dst āshi tylhi gczihh khoshḥạly tam mhlt dinh yinụ̄,th tuhund (qrẓ) mʿāf krun chuh tuhndi khạṭr bhtragr tohyhi pe āshi (zi ghryb sund dl rachuhn kya mqam chuh thavan Allah tʿālyā snzn nẓrn mnz).
Th tath dohs khocziv yath mnz tohụ̄ Allah tʿālyā hs kun vaps phirnh yiyivupth yiyhi pth shkhṣs yikynczhah ʿml tmụ̄ krmcz chhe tamiyuk pvuri pvur jza dinh th timn pytth spdinh ẓlm.

Ae ayman valyv!yylhi tohụ̄ kunhi mqrr vqts tam panh vạnụ̄ qrẓuk mʿāmlh kriv tylhi ạsiv suh lykhan, th tohyhi drmyan yus lykhn vvl āshi ts pazi zi anṣaf san lykhin th lykhn vvl mah krin lykhns ankar yithh pạtthụ̄ zn suh Allah tʿālyā hn lykhun chuh hychihnvvmut,lhādha lykhin suh (yʿny shrʿ th mlky dstvr mṭạbq krin dstavyz lykhnuk ḥq pvur dyant dạry san ada) th mẓmvn lykhnạvin suh shkhṣ yymhi sndi dhmh ḥq (yʿny qrẓ) āshi th ts pazi zi Allah tʿālyā hs khoczin yus tmụ̄ sundprvrdgar chuh th aath (qrẓ kis rqms) mnz gczihh nh (lykhnavnh vqth) kanhh thi kmy krun,pth agr suh shkhṣ yymụ̄ sndi dhmh ḥq vạjb chuh spudmut āshi nasmjh ya natvan,ya āshi nh panh lykhnch ṣlaḥyt thavan tylhi pzi tmụ̄ sndis kạrinds zi suh lykhnạvin anṣaf san, th pnnyv lukv mnz bnạviyvukh z mrd gvah,pth agrdoshve mrd āsn nh dstyab tylhi gczhyn aakh mrd th z khatvnh āsnhi (yim) gczhn timav lukv mnz āsnụ̄ yim tohụ̄ gvạhy khạṭr psnd chhvvkh kran (yʿny aʿtmads qạbl ạsyvukh zanan) takh yimavdoyav khatvnv mnz (hrgah) akis khatvnhi mshith gczihh tylhi pavi amis byakh yad,th gvah yylhi thi (gvạhy khạṭr) bulavnh yin,tim mah krin ankar,th mʿāmlh ạsitn lokutt ya bodd, suh pnnis mʿīads tam lykhith thavns mnz gczihh nh ālsụ̄lagun, yhi tuhund dstavyz tyar krith thavun chuh Allah tʿālyā hs nzdyk zyade anṣafs nkhh th gvạhy khạṭr zyadh mẓbvṭ,th yhi chuh aath thi zyadh qryb zi tohụ̄ gczihv nh shks mnz mbtla aamhi vrạe zi aathav pytthy āshi kanhh tiyuth tjart yymiyuk lyn dn tohụ̄ panh vạnụ̄ kran rvzan chihv tylhi chuhnh tohyhi pytth aamhi kh nah lykhnuk kanhh gnah,th yylhi thi panh vạnụ̄ hynk knnuk mʿāmlh kriv tylhi ạsiv gvah bnavan,byyhi nah gczihh lykhn vạlis nqṣan vatnavnh yun th nah gvahs,th hrgah tohyhi yhi koruv tylhi āshi yhi tuhund ḥkm puhttravun, byyhi rvuziv Allah tʿālyā hs khoczan th Allah tʿālyā chuh tohyhi (mʿāmlatn hnz) tʿlym divan th Allah tʿālyā chh pth kunh chyzs varpạtthụ̄ zann vvl.

Th agr tohụ̄ sfrs pytth ạsv th kanhh lykhn vvl gczihh nh dstyab, tylhi ạsiv kanhh chyz (qrẓh bdl) bnd thavan.pth agr tohyhi mnz akis āshi doyimis pytth aʿtmad tylhi yymụ̄ sndis dyants pytth aʿtmad āvkrnh,ts pazi panun amant ada krun th byyhi rvuzin Allah tʿālyā hs khoczan yus tmụ̄ sundpaln vvl chuh, th tohụ̄ mah ạsiv gvạhy khttith thavan,th yus shkhṣ gvạhy chuh khttith thavan tylhi chuh pzụ̄pạtthụ̄ tmụ̄ sund dl gnhgar, th Allah tʿālyā chuh tuhndyn aʿmaln var pạtthụ̄ zann vvl.

Yikynczhah āsmann mnz th zmyns mnz chuh svrue chuh Allah tʿālyā sndi khạṭr,timh kthh yimh tuhndyn diln mnz chhe khvah timh ẓạhr krụ̄ tav ya czvuri thạvitavuAllah tʿālyā hyyav tohyhi tamiyuk ḥsab,pth ys suh yyczihh ts kri mghfrt th ys yyczihh ts diyhi ʿdhab,th Allah tʿālyā chuh pth chyzs pytth mkml qdrt thavan.

A (amụ̄) rsvln (ṣly Allah ʿlyh vslm) aon tath pytth ayman (yʿny tath korun tṣdyq) yikynczhah timn pytth tihindis rb sndi ṭrfh nạzl krnh āvu byyhi ahli aymanav thi, sarivyav aon (dl san) ayman Allah tʿālyā hs pytth th tmụ̄ sndyn frshtn pytth th tmụ̄ snzn ktabn pytth th tmụ̄ sndyn rsvln pytth, (byyhi chih vnan),asụ̄ chihnh tmụ̄ sndyv pyghmbrvmnzkạnshi drmyan thi (ayman anns mnz) frq kran, byyhi chih (Allah tʿālyā sndis drbars mnz) ʿrẓ kran,aashi bvuz (chvn ḥkm) th aṭaʿt kr (qbvl), ae sanhi rbh! Asụ̄ chihy cze mghfrt mngan th cze kun chuh (aashi sarine) pot phyrun.

Allah tʿālyā chuhnh kạnshi nfss tmụ̄ sndi ṭaqt khoth zyadh tklyf divan,tmụ̄ yosh nyky kmạvtas khạṭr chuh tmiyuk ajr,th tmụ̄ yus gnah kmvv tath pytth chuh tmụ̄ sund ʿdhab,ae sanhi rbh!hrgah aashi mshr phh gczihh ya khṭa gczihh tth pytth mth kr th ash grft, ae sanhi prvrdgar! Byyh mh tav ash pytth tyvutah bar (thi) yuth cze aashi brvuntthimyn lukn pytth tvvmut avsue,ae sanhi prvrdgar! Byyh mh tav aashi pytth tyvutah bar (thi) yus tulnuk ṭaqt aashi mnz chuhnh, byyhi krashi nshi (gnahn pytth) drgzr, byyhi kr aashi mghfrt, byyh kr aashi pytth rḥm,cze chuhkh svn karsaz, vonụ̄kr aashi kạfrn hndis qvms pytth ghlbh ʿṭa.
